lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Under the industry department program, companies would be funded to train engineers overseas but those employees would be required to apply their new skills locally for an as yet unspecified period.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In the last three years it has stepped in to aid seven problem banks, taking over three of them, to protect depositors whose funds were not insured.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Hong Kong likes to call its policy "positive non-intervention," meaning that it helps industry mainly by maintaining economic stability and ensuring that needed roads and harbour facilities are in place.

lst.name: sentence
